title: Ali Xin Yan
synopsis:
In this busy and fast-paced era, how many people still remember the nervousness of writing a letter and the anticipation of waiting for a reply? In the world of fairy tales, there is a white messenger swallow that can carry longings to those far away.

On Valentine's Day, February 14th, 2011, let's relive that heartfelt feeling with Ali and Taozi.

(Source: Douban, translated)
